Lightning Blade Kunai Cutter is a technique developed by Kakashi Hatake. Kakashi [[Chakra Flow|channels]] his lightning chakra into a [[kunai]], increasing its piercing power. Then he strikes his opponent several times.

This technique consumes less chakra than [[Lightning Cutter]] and can be performed without the aid of [[Sharingan]], but is also less effective.
